manuscript_citation: Herbold CW, Pelikan C, Kuzyk O, Hausmann B, Angel R, Berry D, Loy A. 2015. A flexible and economical barcoding approach for highly multiplexed amplicon sequencing of diverse target genes. Front. Microbiol. [Internet] 6:731. Available from: http://dx.doi.org/10.3389/fmicb.2015.00731

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol
